DOC.brief_summary: The objective present randomize control study compare clinical effectiveness safety freeze embryos follow frozen-thawed embryo transfer ( FET ) compare fresh embryo transfer , woman undergo IVF treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Effectiveness Frozen Thawed Embryo Transfer Compared Fresh Embryo Transfer
DOC.detailed_description: A total 800 infertile woman undergo IVF treatment randomize one follow two group computer-generated random number : Fresh embryo transfer group : single fresh embryo transfer FET group : single FET follow freeze embryos stimulate IVF cycle All technique IVF include ovarian stimulation , harvest oocyte , insemination specially prepared sperm embryo culture laboratory accord local protocol . Once embryos culture day 2 3 , woman 3 suitable quality embryos randomize either fresh embryo transfer ( control arm ) FET ( Intervention arm ) . Control arm Women allocate control arm either undergo embryo transfer cleavage stage extended culture transfer blastocyst stage accord local policy . A maximum 2 embryos blastocyst replace accord standard protocol transabdominal ultrasound guidance . Luteal phase support give accord local protocol . Intervention arm For allocate intervention arm fresh embryo transfer undertaken . Embryos frozen vitrification slow freezing cleavage blastocyst stage accord standard agree local protocol . Women contact 4 week arrangement make frozen embryo transfer . After least 4 week woman attend IVF clinic transfer thaw frozen embryo , either natural cycle ( ovulatory woman regular menstrual cycle ) hormonally support cycle use physiological dos estrogen progestogen mimic normal cyclical change within endometrium . The choice replace frozen-thawed embryos natural hormonally mediated cycle decision driven clinical circumstance . Embryos blastocysts thaw accord local protocol . The transfer perform team clinician maximum 2 embryo blastocyst replace accord standard protocol transabdominal ultrasound guidance . Luteal phase support give discretion physician . Follow strategy : A pregnancy test carry 2 week embryo transfer arm . All woman positive pregnancy test 2 week embryo transfer undergo transvaginal ultrasound scan identify presence number gestation sac fetal heart signify ongoing pregnancy . Pelvic scan repeat 8 week , 12 week , 24 week 36 gestation fetal growth . Data pregnancy outcome include early pregnancy loss miscarriage ectopic pregnancy collect . In order achieve consistency respect collection outcome , standardise case report form ( CRF ) complete woman centre . These CRFs include detail treatment receive , pregnancy outcome , complication pregnancy , mode delivery birth outcome .
DOC.criteria: Women 42 year age Presence least 3 embryo suitable freeze day 2 3 follow fertilisation base centre 's criterion Written inform consent Women use donor eggs/donor sperm Women undergo preimplantation genetic diagnosis Women abnormal uterine cavity show hysterosalpingogram saline infusion sonogram Women hydrosalpinges show scan correct treated Women excessive ovarian response risk ovarian hyperstimulation elective freeze already plan Women serum progesterone level day human chorionic gonadotrophin > 1.5ng/ml 5 nmol/L Women whose embryo survive freezethawing past Fresh transfer plan e.g . patient endometriosis adenomyosis receive prolonged downregulation Only frozen transfer plan e.g . patient receive ovarian stimulation regimen may adverse impact endometrium
